p: Several scientists were conducted researches on various botanical origin extracts using solvents of different polarities. To the best of our knowledge, very little researches were conducted on the internal sap of plants without recourse to solvents. One has to recall that several solvents have harmful effect on mankind health [ 3, 4]. It was of interest to investigate the antioxidant and polyphenol profile of pomegranate leaves, fig leaves, guava leaves and olive leaves crude juices.
